desc: Written in Cookbook style, the reader will be taught the features of gnuplot through practical examples accompanied by rich illustrations and code. Every aspect has been considered to ensure ease of understanding of even complex features. Whether you are an old hand at gnuplot or new to it, this book is a convenient visual reference that covers the full range of gnuplotâ€™s capabilities, including its latest features. Some basic knowledge of plotting graphs is necessary.
title: gnuplot Cookbook
